long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Amazon Chatbot: Your Intelligent Shopping Assistant

This browser extension is designed to enhance the Amazon shopping experience by leveraging AI technology. Here's a comprehensive overview of its features and functionality:

1. Product Information Extraction:
   The extension automatically extracts key product details from Amazon pages, including title, description, and price. This is achieved through content script injection and DOM manipulation.

2. AI-Powered Assistance:
   Users can interact with an AI chatbot powered by Claude 3.5 Sonnet model. This allows shoppers to ask questions, seek recommendations, or get more information about products.

3. Real-time Streaming Responses:
   The AI's responses are streamed in real-time, providing a smooth and interactive user experience. Progress indicators keep users informed about the response generation.

This AI Amazon Chatbot extension aims to revolutionize online shopping by providing intelligent, context-aware assistance to users as they browse and make purchasing decisions on Amazon. It combines the power of AI with a user-friendly interface to create a more informed and efficient shopping experience.
